DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether continuous intravenous ketorolac infusion reduces pain patient laparoscopic surgery donate kidney .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Ketorolac Postoperative Pain Laparoscopic Donor Nephrectomy
DOC.criteria: Patients donate kidney via laparoscopic donor nephrectomy History NSAID allergy Asthma History long term opioid use Intraoperative blood loss great 300 mL Postoperative hemodynamic instability Active peptic ulcer disease Advanced renal impairment ( Cr > 2.0 mg/dL ) Bleeding diathesis Current use probenecid Pregnancy
